Jan. 19, 2014 D Butlins Mineworkers (Junior Section)
Butlins Mineworkers (Junior Section) 100 Entertainments Contest Butlins Mineworkers butlins-mineworkers-junior-section
Butlins, Skegness, Lincolnshire, England, UK Programme of Music not to exceed 10 minutes but must include a hymn tune
First Prize: £200, Butlins (Skegness) Award and Read Family Trophy Second Prize: £150 Third Prize: £100 Fourth Prize: £50
Best Soloist (Brian Jones Memorial Trophy): Rachael Clegg - Cornet (Wardle Junior) [N.B. 4BR have incorrectly Laura Conway]
Oct. 17, 2013, 9:29 a.m. Feb. 16, 2014, 10:11 p.m.
1 Wardle High School Junior Band Gwen Smith
2 Youth Brass 1000 Adele Hudson
3 Wigston Enterprise Pat Allsopp
4 Shirland Training Band Dave Harvey
5 Silver Sounds Roy Duncan
